name: [PC] The Ahriman Project
description:
Clash against hordes of ruthless enemies and try your navigation ability through marvellous alien scapes in this simple-but-innovative planar 3D star-shooter game.

Requirements:

  • CPU = Dual Core @ 2.1GHz
  • RAM = 4Gb
  • HDD = 170Mb
  • Multiplayer = none
  • SOFTWARE =, OpenGL 3.0
  • DRM = none
  • Compatible with Windows 7, MacOS X and Linux X11 or above

Developed and published independently by Produzioni CIULLO CORPORATION (see mainsite for details)
